experience.title: A Brand New Smoke & Vape Shop Experience

items.title: Raising The Bar
items.description: Here at our flagship store we will have the best cigars, vapes, and all smoke related accessories. Come check out our walk-in humidor room and gigantic hookah wall!

products.title: Latest & greatest
products.subtitle: All the best vapes, glass, and accessories!
products.description: We have searched far and wide for the highest quality pieces at great prices! Come check out our incredible selection for yourself. ðŸ˜‰

items.name: Vapes
items.description: We carry a large but curated collection of the smoothest and tastiest disposable and refillable vapes.

items.name: Cigars
items.description: In our oversized walk-in humidor we carry a vast selection of cigars from all over the world.

items.name: Cannabis Accessories
items.description: We have everything you need from smoking devices like glass pipes, bowls, herb vapirizers, and rolling papers to stash cans and grinders.

items.name: Hookahs
items.description: On our massive hookah wall we have a large variety of hookah models and some of the best shisha around.
